biography: Tommy is a rising star in the Finnish golf scene, hailing from Espoo Ringside Golf.  He brings a powerful yet precise game to the course, consistently demonstrating both length off the tee and a deft touch around the greens.

This will be Tommy’s third appearance at the prestigious Hector Trophée, having previously competed in the 2024 and 2025 editions. While he’s yet to claim victory in the main event or secure the Victor trophy for the best individual performance, his consistent improvement and dedication are evident.

Tommy’s participation adds a layer of intrigue to this year’s competition.  His steady progress suggests he’s a strong contender to contend for both trophies, and golf fans will be eager to see how he performs under the pressure of this highly competitive event.
